mods.abstract: Two color window card (navy and light blue on white) Hatch poster announcing Ben Rector with Judah and the Lion at the Ryman Auditorium in Nashville on October 10. Poster is second in a set of two. Poster features woodcut of boy on a bicycle and a house.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
